cast.overview: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them suffers a family tragedy.
cast.title: Mystic River

details.biography:
Connor Paolo (born July 11, 1990) is an American actor. He is best known for his portrayal of Eric van der Woodsen on The CW series Gossip Girl, and his earlier work in two Oliver Stone films, World Trade Center and Alexander
